DOC.brief_summary: Purpose show HHHFNC method effective safe nCPAPand even comfortable non-invasive respiratory support prevention extubation failure preterm gestational age 26-32 week . Patients require mechanical ventilation least 6 hour first 7 postnatal day include study.When patient Fi O2 < 0,40 , Pa CO2 < 65 mmHg , pH > 7.20 , MAP ( mean airway pressure ) < 7 cm H2O , extubated statistically stable.Oxygen-air mixture 4-6 l / min flow rate set HHHFNC group , pressure set 5-8 cm H2O NCPAP group . When flow 2 l / min , FiO2 < 0.30 24 hour , free oxygen introduce . In NCPAP group , pressure 5 cm H2O FiO2 < 0.30 24 hour , free oxygen introduce .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing HHHFNC nCPAP Ventilation Methods Prevention Extubation Failure Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose show HHHFNC method effective safe nCPAP even comfortable non-invasive respiratory support prevention extubation failure preterm gestational age 26-32 week . Method Primary Outcome Measures : The effectiveness HHHFNC nCPAP technique prevention extubation failure within 7 day follow first extubation preterms need mechanical ventilation within first 7 postnatal day Secondary Outcome Measures : - total duration invasive non-invasive respiratory support duration free oxygen demand patient - Premature morbidity PDA , NEC , ROP , IVH , BPDand sepsis - The degree nasal trauma score degree nasal mucosal injury - FiO2 level first extubation 6 hour extubation - The cause reintubation apnea , acidosis , increase need FiO2 - The reintubation predispose factor pneumothorax , atelectasis , PDA extubation - The weight change first 7-day period extubation - The two group term neurodevelopmental change Study design Patients require mechanical ventilation least 6 hour first 7 postnatal day include study . When patient Fi O2 < 0,40 , Pa CO2 < 65 mmHg , pH > 7.20 , MAP ( mean airway pressure ) < 7 cm H2O , extubated statistically stable . Oxygen-air mixture 4-6 l / min flow rate set HHHFNC group , pressure set 5-8 cm H2O NCPAP group . When flow 2 l / min , FiO2 < 0.30 24 hour , free oxygen introduce . In NCPAP group , pressure 5 cm H2O FiO2 < 0.30 24 hour , free oxygen introduce . Reintubation criterion set ; - FiO2 â‰¥ 0.50 order keep oxygen saturation measure pulse oximetry 90 % high , - Apnea require 6 alert 24 -hour period 6 consecutive hour 1 apnea require positive pressure ventilation , - Persistent acidosis ; presence pH < 7.20 PCO2 > 65 mmHg two different blood gas draw interval least 30 minute treatment-resistant metabolic acidosis , - Severe respiratory distress , - Pulmonary haemorrhage cardiopulmonary arrest .
DOC.criteria: Preterm infant gestational age 26 week 0 day 31 week 6 day include . 1 Presence major congenital anomaly , 2 Presence neuromuscular disease , 3 Need surgery within 7 day follow extubation 4 Consent provide refuse
